Name: Graceward - Complete Edition
About the game: Fusing the styles of Classic Point and Click Adventure with Side-Scrolling Shooter- Graceward creates a fresh experience, steeped in old school design. 'Buried in this dark future is something raw. A deep and primal energy that runs like blood under the ground. Is it a rebellion against our fates? A grasp at a second chance? Or is it just the heat of last night’s fires, still clung to the breeze for a short while longer...' Featuring from the Shooter side of the family: • Hand-designed levels with dozens of hidden secrets, calling-back to 90s FPS's. • A heavy original score full of industrial sound, heavy metal, and haunting melodies. • And several hundred gallons of enemy blood. And from the Adventure Game side: • Form relationships and choose which companions will accompany you. • Learn skills to solve familiar and unfamiliar puzzles and mysteries. • And make tough decisions which will twist and turn the narrative.
